channel.title: Timeline on Portfolio site
channel.description: Recent content in Timeline on Portfolio site

item.title: Leaving Cert
item.description: St. Clare’s College, Ballyjamesduff, Co. Cavan Finished all honors with 425 points.

item.title: DCU - Electronic & computer engineering
item.description: This proved to be my first introduction to software. Unfortunatelly due to financial situation and lack of interested I dropped the course 1 year later.

item.title: Mr. Crumb - Factory work
item.description: First real work experience where I had a chance to truly learn to work under pressure, develop personal and team work skills. This provided me sufficient financial security and the drive to further pursue my education. • Learned to be confident in my work and ability • Flexibility to conduct many different tasks • Learned to work under time constraints and heavy work loads

item.title: Ericsson summer work experience
item.description: First work experience in the sofware field after 2nd year of study. I was part of DevOps / Continuous Integration team. This was very much out of my comfort zone and I had to pick up on many new skills like Containerization, Docker and Kubernetes. I found it very overwhelming but it proved very helpful at learning these new skills. I was difficul to keep up with tasks but I was able to integrate new automated tests suites.

item.title: Ericsson work placement
item.description: 3rd year work placement back with Ericsson and the same team as before. This time I had previous knowledge and skills that I was able to build upon during the school semester. I became a lot more proficient with Containerisations as a whole and Docker became second nature. Kubernetes still proved difficult to work with, but I had greater success that I did before. Throughout my time I managed to work more on new test suites for automated pipelines as well as paving the way to some more automation of repetitive tasks.

item.title: TUS - Software developement with cloud computing
item.description: I’m on my final year of study. I continue to aim for First Class Honours (1.1) which I managed to keep up with so far.
